pages.text: $(li)When several $(l:patchouli:structures/small_goblin_camp)Small Goblin Camps$(/l) merge, form a larger camp, known as a Medium Goblin Camps.$(br)$(li)They can be found over the Overworld.$(br)$(li)Do not get too close to them, because the Goblins will attack you desperately protecting their little home.
